code: export var LOGIN="LOGIN";export var login=function login(email,token){return function(dispatch){localStorage.setItem("access_token",token);dispatch({type:LOGIN,payload:email});};};export var AUTH="AUTH";export var authorize=function authorize(email,token){return function(dispatch){var data=email+":"+token;localStorage.setItem("access_token",data);dispatch({type:AUTH,payload:email});};};export var logout=function logout(){return function(dispatch){localStorage.clear();dispatch({type:"LOGOUT"});};};
